text: Frederik "Frits" Bolkestein (; 4 April 1933 - 17 February 2025) was a Dutch politician of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He served as a Member of the House of Representatives from 16 January 1978, until 5 November 1982. Bolkestein died in Laren, Netherlands on 17 February 2025, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Prof.Dr.Mr. F. title: Frits Bolkestein
